TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Pkcs12Info extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 PKCS#12 PFX 内容中的数据。

span.span: Represents the data from PKCS#12 PFX contents.
This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs12Info Decode (ReadOnlyMemory<byte> encodedBytes, out int bytesConsumed, bool skipCopy = false);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs12Info Decode(valuetype System.ReadOnlyMemory`1<unsigned int8> encodedBytes, [out] int32& bytesConsumed, bool skipCopy) cil managed
Public Shared Function Decode (encodedBytes As ReadOnlyMemory(Of Byte), ByRef bytesConsumed As Integer, Optional skipCopy As Boolean = false) As Pkcs12Info
static member Decode : ReadOnlyMemory<byte> * int * bool -> System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs12Info
public static System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs12Info? Decode (ReadOnlyMemory<byte> encodedBytes, out int bytesConsumed, bool skipCopy = false);

param.name: encodedBytes
param.span: 要解释为 PKCS#12 PFX 的数据。

span.span: The data to interpret as a PKCS#12 PFX.

param.name: bytesConsumed
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含一个指示 中的字节数量的值（由此方法读取）。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a value that indicates the number of bytes from which were read by this method.

param.span: 该参数未经初始化即被处理。

span.span: This parameter is treated as uninitialized.

param.name: skipCopy
param.span: 表示存储 而不进行防御性复制；否则为 。

span.span: to store without making a defensive copy; otherwise, .
The default is .

summary.span: 将提供的数据读取为 PKCS#12 PFX，返回内容的对象视图。

span.span: Reads the provided data as a PKCS#12 PFX and returns an object view of the contents.

returns.span: 从输入中解码的 PKCS#12 PFX 的对象视图。

span.span: An object view of the PKCS#12 PFX decoded from the input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认行为是从发出的第一个字节的防御副本 `bytesConsumed` `encodedBytes` 。The default behavior of this method is to make a defensive copy of the first `bytesConsumed` bytes from `encodedBytes`. 当 `skipCopy` 参数为时 `true` ，将跳过此防御副本。When the `skipCopy` parameter is `true`, this defensive copy is skipped. 如果跳过了防御复制，并在 `bytesConsumed` `encodedBytes` 返回值或其方法或属性生成的任何对象的生存期内更改了前个字节的内容，则这些对象的方法和属性可能会产生有意义的结果或引发异常，因为状态已损坏。If the defensive copy is skipped and the contents of the first `bytesConsumed` bytes of `encodedBytes` change during the lifetime of the returned value or of any object produced by its methods or properties, then methods and properties on those objects may produce nonsense results or throw exceptions due to the corrupted state. 因此，如果调用方 `true` `skipCopy` 可以合理地确保数据保持不变，则建议只使用参数值。Callers are therefore advised to only use a `true` value for the `skipCopy` parameter when they can be reasonably assured that the data will stay intact.

exception.span: 参数的内容未成功解码为 PKCS#12 PFX。

span.span: The contents of the parameter were not successfully decoded as a PKCS#12 PFX.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IntegrityMode As Pkcs12IntegrityMode

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示为 内容提供的防篡改的类型。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the type of tamper protection provided for the contents.

value.span: 指示为内容提供的篡改保护类型的枚举成员之一 。

span.span: One of the enumeration members that indicates the type of tamper protection provided for the contents.

summary.span: 尝试使用密码验证 内容的完整性。

span.span: Attempts to verify the integrity of the contents with a password.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于因内容已更改而导致密码不正确，无法区分此错误。It's not possible to distinguish the error due to the password being incorrect from the error due to the contents having been altered. 通常情况下，受密码保护的 PFX 对于提供完整性的 MAC 算法和提供机密性的加密算法使用相同的密码，但文件格式不会导致要求。It's usually the case that a password-protected PFX uses the same password for the MAC algorithm providing integrity and the encryption algorithm providing confidentiality, but the file format doesn't make that a requirement. 因此，无法保证导致 `true` 此方法返回的密码会在调用时成功 。Therefore, there is no guarantee that a password which results in a `true` return from this method will succeed on a call to .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool VerifyMac(valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<char> password) cil managed
Public Function VerifyMac (password As ReadOnlySpan(Of Char)) As Boolean

param.name: password
param.span: 用于尝试验证完整性的密码。

span.span: The password to use to attempt to verify integrity.

summary.span: 尝试使用由 System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Char} 表示的密码验证 内容的完整性。

span.span: Attempts to verify the integrity of the contents with a password represented by a System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Char}.

returns.span: 如果密码成功验证了 内容的完整性，则为 ；如果密码不正确或内容已更改，则为 。

span.span: if the password successfully verifies the integrity of the contents; if the password is not correct or the contents have been altered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 PKCS # 12 规范中，在 `null` 密码和 "空" 密码之间进行区分，该差异反映在此方法的返回值中。In the PKCS#12 specification, a distinction is made between a `null` password and an "empty" password, and that difference is reflected in the return value of this method. `ReadOnlySpan.Empty` 表示 `null` 密码，并 `String.Empty.AsSpan()` 表示 "empty" 密码。`ReadOnlySpan.Empty` represents the `null` password and `String.Empty.AsSpan()` represents the "empty" password. 如果这两个值中的一个值返回 `true` ，则其他值不会。If one of those two values returns `true`, the other won't.

span.span: The value is not .

exception.span: PKCS#12 PFX 内容指定的哈希算法选项无法识别或不受此平台支持。

span.span: The hash algorithm option specified by the PKCS#12 PFX contents could not be identified or is not supported by this platform.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool VerifyMac(string password) cil managed
Public Function VerifyMac (password As String) As Boolean

param.name: password
param.span: 用于尝试验证完整性的密码。

span.span: The password to use to attempt to verify integrity.

summary.span: 尝试使用由 表示的密码验证 内容的完整性。

span.span: Attempts to verify the integrity of the contents with a password represented by a .

returns.span: 如果密码成功验证了 内容的完整性，则为 ；如果密码不正确或内容已更改，则为 。

span.span: if the password successfully verifies the integrity of the contents; if the password is not correct or the contents have been altered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 PKCS # 12 规范中，在 `null` 密码和 "空" 密码之间进行区分，该差异反映在此方法的返回值中。In the PKCS#12 specification, a distinction is made between a `null` password and an "empty" password, and that difference is reflected in the return value of this method. 如果 `null` 字符串返回 `true` ，则 返回 `false` ，反之亦然。If the `null` string returns `true`, then returns `false`, and vice versa.

span.span: The value is not .

exception.span: PKCS#12 PFX 内容指定的哈希算法选项无法识别或不受此平台支持。

span.span: The hash algorithm option specified by the PKCS#12 PFX contents could not be identified or is not supported by this platform.
